title: Hilaria Baldwin delights in baby's 'wonderful strong heartbeat' after pregnancy checkup
text:
She miscarried a pregnancy earlier this year.

So Hilaria Baldwin delighted in the news that her unborn child had a 'strong heartbeat' after she attended a routine check-up early Thursday morning.

After informing fans she was off to see her doctor, the mother-of-four shared an update to Instagram Stories.

'Baby looks wonderful!' she wrote. 'Strong heart!!'

Hilaria Baldwin delights in baby's 'wonderful strong heartbeat' after pregnancy checkup; she is seen on her Instagram Stories on Thursday morning

'Tiny person is growing wonderfully,' she wrote, sharing a picture of her 4D scan

The 35-year-old star then shared a picture of a 4D scan of the fetus.

'Tiny person is growing wonderfully,' she wrote. 'I have a secret obsession with gender reveal videos. Give me ideas. I should know in about a week or two, because I did the early blood test.

'I'm gonna put a place to respond in my insta stories. Or you can give me ideas here, if you'd like.'

Hilaria announced last month she is expecting her fifth child with husband Alec Baldwin.

Good news: After informing fans she was off to see her doctor, the mother-of-four shared her happy update to Instagram Stories

The health and wellness expert - who already has Carmen, six, Rafael, four, Leonardo, three, and Romeo, 16 months, with Alec - explained that while it was early in her pregnancy, she wanted to avoid any speculation.

She wrote back: 'People poke around and try to find out what is going on. When you simply share what is happening, you take the story into your own hands and they tend to leave you alone more.

'Secrets are only interesting when they are secrets.'

'True power': Hilaria opened up about her miscarriage during a sponsored post on Thursday, sharing a throwback picture of her and Alec during her d &c surgery

Hilaria said she is 'excited' to be pregnant again, five months after announcing she had tragically suffered a miscarriage.

She said: 'It is still very early... but we have learned that there is a little person inside of me. The sound of this strong heart makes me so happy - especially because of the loss we experienced in the spring.

'We want to share this news as we are excited and don't want to hide the pregnancy.

'These first few months are tough with exhaustion and nausea ... and I don't want to have to pretend that I feel OK.'
description: She miscarried a pregnancy earlier this year.
